item.title: Is JavaScript still necessary
item.description: Do you need JavaScript these days learning JavaScript will allow you to do the following things Automations websites Development (front and back) Online Presentations Animations in websites Event Handling Animations in websites Develop Games Data-Science

item.title: Top five reasons to use Github
item.description: GitHub 2021 Here are five reasons we use GitHub Free hosting Our Web app currently is running two golang servers, one of which is hosted on google app engine the other on github.

item.title: why python is so popular
item.description: Is python right for you Despite it slower performance million if developer, data scientist and other love python here are five reason why i think python is so popular learning curve Python has a short learning curve and is often recommended to beginners.
